overview: As the COO of Lijit Networks, Walter is responsible for all aspects of daily operations including sales, marketing, business development, finance, product development and engineering. Prior to this, Walter led the Linux field sales organization in the Americas for Novell. Walter was a Partner at Novell Ventures, and was a Principal at Cambridge Technology Capital, two successful venture capital firms. Earlier in his career Walter served as Client Partner for Cambridge Technology Partners. While in graduate school he co-founded DCN a developer of Internet appliances and software solutions for live imaging.
